article_title: New Relic's Cirne on Obamacare Web Site, IPO Plans
article_text:
Apple Expands Into India, What to Expect

48:13 - Maxim Group Senior Analyst Nehal Choski discusses his outlook for Apple and the company's future in India and China. He speaks on "Bloomberg Markets." Choski owns no stock in Apple. (Source: Bloomberg)

article_metadata.description:
Dec. 17 (Bloomberg) -- Lewis Cirne, chief executive officer of New Relic Inc., talks about the company's role in the U.S. government's repair of the Obamacare web site, HealthCare.gov, New Relic's decision to hire Hilarie Koplow-McAdams as chief revenue officer and the outlook for an initial public offering.
     He speaks with Emily Chang on Bloomberg Television's "Bloomberg West." (Source: Bloomberg)
